abstract: Eight stories from members of the Crossendale community in Echuca, Victoria.
description: Eight residents of the Crossendale estate in Echuca in Northern Victoria share their personal stories as part of a Digital Storytelling workshop. While the subjects vary, the topic is mostly centred around the things that lie closest to the participants' hearts.
